meanings.definition: Behoving: to be necessary or proper for
meanings.sent1: It behoves us to study for the exam.
meanings.sent2: It behoving to wear a helmet while riding a bike.
meanings.sent3: It is behoving to bring an umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: It behoves a seed to be planted in fertile soil to grow.
meanings.sent5: Behoving a key to unlock a door is essential.

meanings.sent1: The behoving dress for the party was elegant.
meanings.sent2: She chose the behoving shoes for the occasion.
meanings.sent3: The behoving hat completed his outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The behoving colors of the painting matched the room decor.
meanings.sent5: The behoving size of the table fit perfectly in the room.

meanings.sent1: It behoves us to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: It is behoving for parents to guide their children.
meanings.sent3: It behoving for the team to practice before the game.
meanings.sent4: It behoves a leader to make wise decisions for the group.
meanings.sent5: Behoving a student to ask questions for better understanding.
